title: Bard Chime Icon Color Change
body: While not an impactful bug, while playing as Bard {{champion:432}}  one of the icons for my Chimes on the minimap turned red.  I was still able to collect it as normal and the icon cleared off the minimap, it was just odd more than anything.

replies.body: Chimes have a limited (though very long) lifespan. When Chimes are shown in red it means they're close to the end of their life and need to be collected soon or you'll miss out on getting them.

It would really help if the chimes somehow stood out on the field because most of the time it feels like they blend with the background texture.

Or might that be because I'm playing at the lowest settings?

Would it be possible to add some brightness to the chimes that are in the fog of war? Make them as bright as those chimes that are in vision range.
Sometimes I miss easy chimes that are in a nearby brush cause I didn't notice them (or didn't look at minimap).
